title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to open a popup menu in the left vertical ruler of the Java editor in Photon, the menu does not appear.
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, no menu pops up to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a menu should appear that allows the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler

Expected result: A menu should appear allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
